content: I'm looking to improve my car's performance even further. I recently participated in the Michigan Auto Racking Championship and made it to the top 10, but I think I can do better. Do you have any tips on how to optimize my car's suspension setup for better handling? By the way, I took my car to a local mechanic a few months ago to get it tuned, and the results were amazing - my car gained an extra 20 horsepower, which made a huge difference in its acceleration.
